Neural Network Color Predictor

A neural network tries to find the complement for a given color.

By clicking the 'Test neural network' button, a new random color will be generated and applied to the background. The big box in the middle labeled 'Prediction' is the guess of the neural network. The smaller box below shows the perfect complement. The closer those two are together, the better the neural network has been trained.

Clicking the 'Train'-Button will train the neural network with 500 random colors and their perfect complement. The more training sessions are done, the smaller the error margin should become.

This site was inspired by Jabrils who made a project using a neural network to predict if black or white text looks better on a random background color. A simply neural network library was used that is provided by the CodingTrain
